评论详情: This tee-shirt takes on a generous touch of glamour with a band of shoulder-to-shoulder black lace. Generous cut with soft fabric makes this an excellent buy. Pairs nicely with black pants.

It's made of very soft fabric, and I love the design. However, the tag is scratchy (pet peeve) and a little difficult to remove. The sleeves are long enough, which tends to be a problem for me, and the shirt runs slightly small compared to similar items I've purchased on Amazon. I would recommend buying a size larger.
Good quality shirt! I'm 5'4 190lbs and the large fit great

评论概述: Nice soft sweater, runs a bit large
评论详情: Nice soft sweater, I like the longer length, the one I got runs a bit large. If you like your sweater to be a bit baggy, order your normal size. If you want more form-fitting, size down.

Lightweight, good quality, comfortable sweater. Machine washable. Sleeves aren't too short they go-to my wrists/hands. Gorgeous blue with a classy black lace on the shoulders.  Good value for the cost
I like the style. Fits well and is comfortable.
I ordered a medium, received a large. It has a weird smell, like a pesticide. I washed it but the smell persists.
To much polyester
I was disappointed with this top – was very unflattering. Did not fit as expected and material felt cheap. Didn’t look like the photos – lace on front was not as pretty as pictured.

I bought the yellow colored sweater. It is very beautiful and very comfortable. It also looks very sophisticated and elegant. It is also true to size. I have gotten many compliments on this beautiful sweater when I wear it.

评论概述: The color and fit are right on
评论详情: This has been through several washes and still looks good as new.

A lot of the reviews said it runs small so I was tempted to size up but I’m glad I didn’t. The maroon one was in my opinion true to size. Honestly looks just like the picture. Is a thin soft material, if you hold it up to the light you can see through it. Looks good on and not too cheap.
I love this shirt!  the fit and the material is so light , yet warm and comfortable. I would recommend it. I'm 5'4" and 165 lbs and I got the medium and it is perfect not tight at all.
True to size, beautiful top. You can feel the sequin through the shirt but it's not too uncomfortable. Over all love this top and want more colors.
In style great color
Super cute sweater!!

I bought this sweater for my daughter for our family photos. It fit her a little bit bigger than what we would’ve liked, but it’s still looked very cute. I would definitely recommend sizing down if you’re in between sizes..
I ordered a Large and the sleeves were too long and baggy. I would order a size down unless you like it baggy.

This sweater is lightweight (for a sweater), looks nice, fits well, is loose and stretchy but doesn't look like you're swimming in it. It's long! Which I love, too many crop-tops now days which are not age-appropriate for me.  The lace is a nice accent, I only wish it would have gone around to the back of the shirt too. This will go well with a pair of jeans or leggings and boots for the fall! Seems well made, material is nice and soft.

I really like this shirt a lot. It's lightweight but at the same time warm, which will be perfect as fall sets in. It's well made, and all of the sewing and stitching is well done. It fits me perfectly, and it did not shrink any after washing and drying. It's basically wrinkle free as well. It stretches easily to put on or take off, but it retains its shape and does not get stretched out. I'm really glad that I found this and it is a good value for what you get.

评论概述: Better than what I first thought
评论详情: When I pulled it out of the package, it looked cheap and I didn't even want to try it on as I didn't think I would like it at all.  It was surprisingly better on me.  The color blue is pretty and it fits nice.  I thought that the lace part would be see through, but its just an overlay to the shirt underneath.  I got my regular size large and it works.

Very comfortable top with soft material.  The lacy top adds a fancy flare which looks good with my black work slacks but also looks dressy with jeans. I wear size XL to XXL so I errored on the side of caution and ordered XXL.  Fits good through the body, sleeves are just about an inch too long but they can be cuffed or pushed up.
This shirt is soft and very cute. The fabric is thin but will still provide warmth. It fits true to size the neck opening is wider than I was expecting.
true to size, super cute. perfect for fall. love the lace detail and the blue.

I bought this because I'm 6ft tall and it's really hard to find shirts that have sleeves long enough to actually come all the way to my wrists.  I figured from the cut of this (meant to be a little long/baggy) that it would  actually be long enough for my arms, and sure enough it is! The lace seems to be attached pretty well too. I'll update my review if it shrinks or comes apart after a few washes.

评论概述: Women's Black Lace Top Elegant Long Sleeve Sweatshirt
评论详情: Although  description says it is a sweatshirt, pictures looked like this is a sweater type top. However, this is a regular jersey knit sweatshirt fabric.  The blue color i got also is not as vibrant as the color on the screen, a little more dull vs the picture. The cut of the top also did not fit my body shape. It has a long but narrow cut. Even though it fit me in my usual size, it goes much lower than I would like on my 5'3" tall body. It maybe a better fit for a taller person.
Size fit perfectly. Washed up great and didn’t dry it in the dryer. I even got a compliment on how cute it was. I might buy another color.
Lacey decor around front was not as pretty as picture.
I love the color

It is a soft, light sweatshirt with black lace at the top. It is flattering and comfy. I have 2. Wine and turquoise. Size large. I am 6 foot, and 170 pounds- could have ordered a medium, but, i prefer it a little looser. Would order agin.
This shirt is a good value for the money. I love the lease and the way it feels when I wear it. It is just warm enough to get through a crisp day.
Cute blouse, but a large was really big and this is the size I normally get.
True to size. Looks good, washes well, and is comfortable. I get lots of compliments when I wear this.
I love the color and the way it fits
